Articles.Content:
Is there an option to not have "remove from symmetry" button during flight, even assuming someone have enabled advanced tweakables?

The reason i am asking is because of BG design, where I use two servos for rotation, and plan to share the craft. As they are connected with struts to a center point, I want to do as much as I can do to prevent others from summoning the kraken.

I actually ran a test where the lack of symmetry only prevent it from rotating to the full degree, but had not tried to attempt it with mismatch target angle, shift PoV to somewhere else, and then either shift back to the in-orbit craft or load it from that savepoint.

Edited August 12, 2019 by Jestersage
